DOC.brief_summary: About 17 % Chinese American preschool child obese , compare 12.4 % child age three five year reside US ; prevalence obesity expect increase future . Therefore , propose study adapt home-based technology-centered childhood obesity prevention program low-income Chinese American mother child three five year old . The aim study assess feasibility intervention estimate effect size child 's mother ' outcome .
DOC.brief_title: HomeTech Healthy Lifestyle Program Mothers With Young Children
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim adapt implement family-centered technology-based intervention prevent obesity young Chinese American child low-income family overweight mother . The propose study framework base Information Motivation Behavioral Skills Model , include mother ' gain knowledge/information , increase personal social motivator , acquire behavioral skill towards behavioral change . The intervention develop Community Advisory Committee validate cultural appropriateness beta-testing process . The validated intervention implement thereafter . Eligible overweight mother young Chinese American child ( age three five year ) recruit local day care setting , low-income housing Head Start program participate study . Participants randomize either intervention ( N=15 ) control group ( N=15 ) . Participants intervention group receive 8-week online interactive session activity deliver tablet computer . Participants control group receive general health promotion topic relevant preschool-age child via mail material weekly eight week .
DOC.criteria: Children : must age three five mother identifies child Chinese ; healthydefined free chronic acute illness . Mothers : must identify Chinese primary provider child , able speak read Chinese English ; BMI > = 23.0 ; meet lowincome requirement Bay Area . Have acute chronic condition prevent perform daily activity
